attributes.action: Community sentences services should be enforced and mandatory
attributes.background:
We live in very difficult times where we watch councils doing cuts because of tiny budgets and prioritise diferent projects council should enforce communities sentences to cover the shortage of staff and budget for keep the destrict clean

https://www.gov.uk/community-sentences

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Courts can already enforce a failure to complete community service.  We're not sure in what circumstances you'd like it to be mandatory to give such a sentence. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
